what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: work--progress R package accompany Advent Code website associated template.

what: Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day
title: Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day
text: Assumes directory year relative path "./YYYY" directory day relative path "./YYYY/day/DD", YYYY DD values year day. case post created using aoc_new_day(). directory day year corresponding directory "./_freeze", also deleted. Additionally, aoc_delete_year(), listing page ./YYYY.qmd (YYYY value year) deleted.

title: Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day
Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year. Defaults current year.

title: Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day
text: path day deleted (invisibly)

title: Delete the directory for a day or year — aoc_delete_day
Delete an introduction post — aoc_delete_introduction
text: Delete introduction post

title: Delete an introduction post — aoc_delete_introduction
Delete an introduction post — aoc_delete_introduction
text: year integer representing year. Defaults current year.

title: Delete an introduction post — aoc_delete_introduction

what: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: Get puzzle input Advent Code website given day year save file. file saved current working directory relative path "./YYYY/day/DD/input", YYYY value year parameter DD value day parameter. path echoes URL structure Advent Code website.

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year. Defaults current year.

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: Returns, invisibly, character string absolute path input file.

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: function assumes account Advent Code website. function work, must set ADVENT_SESSION environment variable .Renviron file. guidance find session token, see https://github.com/dgrtwo/adventdrob/tree/main#installation. session token, can set environment variable usethis::edit_r_environ(). function adapted https://github.com/dgrtwo/adventdrob/blob/main/R/input.R.

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input

what: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame
title: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame
text: #' Read puzzle input data , one row per line. assumes input stored file called input directory "./YYYY/day/DD", YYYY DD values year day. case post created using aoc_new_day(). class tbl_df, reading done readr::read_delim(). class data.frame, reading done utils::read.table(). defaults chosen suit typical Advent Code puzzle input.

title: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame
code: aoc_input_data_frame(   day,   year = NULL,   class = c("tbl_df", "data.frame"),   col_names = FALSE,   show_col_types = FALSE,   view = FALSE )

title: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year. Defaults current year. class character. One 'tbl_df' 'data.frame'. Default 'tbl_df'. col_names logical. relevant class tbl_df. TRUE, first row input file used column names. Default FALSE show_col_types logical. TRUE, column types shown. Default FALSE view logical. TRUE, calls utils::View() view returned input. Default FALSE

title: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame
text: data frame containing puzzle input day year.

title: Read puzzle input as a data frame — aoc_input_data_frame

what: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix
title: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix
text: Read puzzle input matrix, one row per line, default one character per column. assumes input stored file called input directory "./YYYY/day/DD", YYYY DD values year day. case post created using aoc_new_day().

title: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix
code: aoc_input_matrix(   day,   year = NULL,   mode = c("character", "numeric"),   split = "",   view = FALSE )

title: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year. Defaults current year. mode Character string. One 'character' 'numeric'. Default 'character'. split character. string split input . Default "", .e. one character per column view logical. TRUE, calls utils::View() view returned input. Default FALSE

title: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix
text: matrix containing puzzle input day year.

title: Read puzzle input as a matrix — aoc_input_matrix

what: Read puzzle input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
title: Read puzzle input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
text: Read puzzle input vector, one element per line. assumes input stored file called input directory "./YYYY/day/DD", YYYY DD values year day. case post created using aoc_new_day(). reading done readr::read_lines().

title: Read puzzle input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
Read puzzle input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year. Defaults current year. mode Character string. One 'character' 'numeric'. Default 'character'.

title: Read puzzle input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
text: vector containing puzzle input day year.

title: Read puzzle input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
Create an introduction post — aoc_new_introduction

Create an introduction post — aoc_new_introduction
text: year integer representing year. Defaults current year.

title: Create an introduction post — aoc_new_introduction
text: path introduction post (invisibly)

title: Create an introduction post — aoc_new_introduction

what: Set up up a new post — aoc_new_post
title: Set up up a new post — aoc_new_post
text: Create necessary directories new post, copy template files make relevant day year (see Details).

title: Set up up a new post — aoc_new_post
code: aoc_new_post(day, year = NULL)  aoc_new_day(day, year = NULL)

title: Set up up a new post — aoc_new_post
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year. Defaults current year.

title: Set up up a new post — aoc_new_post
text: path new day (invisibly)

title: Set up up a new post — aoc_new_post
text: aoc_new_post() aoc_new_day() assume called project directory _templates, subdirectory post-template contains, minimum, file index.qmd. copy files post-template directory "./YYYY/day/DD" YYYY value year parameter DD value day parameter (creating directories already exist). path echoes URL structure Advent Code website. Additionally, replace instances YYYY DD index.qmd (present) script.R files values year day parameters, respectively. addition, aoc_new_day() also run aoc_get_input() download puzzle input save post directory. Advent Code session token set .Renviron file, recommend using aoc_new_day() aoc_new_post(). wish download save puzzle input separately, use aoc_new_post().

title: Set up up a new post — aoc_new_post

what: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
title: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
text: Creates directory relative path ./YYYY (YYYY value year) copies listing template ./_templates/YYYY.qmd YYYY.qmd , latter, replaces YYYY value year, file name file . Additionally, introduction post _metadata.yml may created. See Details information.

title: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
text: year integer representing year. Defaults current year. intro Logical. Whether include introduction post.

title: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
text: path new year directory (invisibly)

title: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year
text: listing page, ./YYYY.qmd (YYYY value year) picks posts subdirectory ./YYYY/day (echoes URL structure Advent Code website). Note website fail render posts day directory. avoid problem, default introduction post YYYY-intro created, assuming directory ./_templates/YYYY-intro exists (website template https://github.com/EllaKaye/advent--code-website-template'. want introduction post, set intro = FALSE delete template. Additionally, file ./_templates/_metadata.yml, copied ./YYYY/day/_metadata.yml.

title: Create directory and files for a new year — aoc_new_year

what: Get URLs from the Advent of Code website — aoc_url
title: Get URLs from the Advent of Code website — aoc_url
text: Get URL Advent Code website puzzle puzzle input given day year.

title: Get URLs from the Advent of Code website — aoc_url
code: aoc_url(day, year = NULL, browse = FALSE)  aoc_url_input(day, year = NULL, browse = FALSE)

title: Get URLs from the Advent of Code website — aoc_url
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year. Defaults current year. browse logical - URL opened browser?

title: Get URLs from the Advent of Code website — aoc_url
text: character string URL

title: Get URLs from the Advent of Code website — aoc_url
